issue.title: [C++] max_element_wise / min_element_wise does not support binary
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14113](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14113). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In general, in other kernels, we consider binary types to be comparable (e.g. we can do sort or top_k on binary types).  Given this, min_element_wise and max_element_wise should support binary types (i.e. binary, large_binary, fixed_size_binary, string, large_string)
